VirtualTriggerSnippet.description: Create an instance of VirtualTrigger with initializer;

body: ${1:myInstance} : VirtualTrigger :=(Id := UINT#${2:id}, Position := DINT#${3:pos}, EventHandler := ${4:NULL}, PositiveTolerance := ${5:-1}, NegativeTolerance := ${6:-1});
VirtualTriggerSnippet2.description: Create an instance of VirtualTrigger with initializer and tolerance;
